answers.answer: Hi.  Your numbers agree, normal for having eaten a high carb meal.  Best thing you can do now is focus on healthy eating and not worry  about diabetes.  Retesting hba1c in 3 - 6 months should also allay your fears.  It should be stable.

Hi!It seems like you are a bit anxious about diabetes, I agree with Super_sally888- make sure you are eating well and get exercise regularly and diabetes shouldn't be a concern.I did see in one of your other posts that another member mentioned getting your thyroid checked- I don't know much about that, but that sounds like good advice- the reply was in this thread so you can check it out-http://www.medhelp.org/posts/Diabetes-Prevention--Pre-Diabetes/a1c-53-please-help/show/2943818Here's a link to the thyroid community she mentioned too-http://www.medhelp.org/forums/Thyroid-Disorders/show/73Hope that helps and you get some answers regarding your symptoms soon!

question: Hello,I have a medical concern.I don`t have any type of diabetes as well as my family members.Already 2-3 weeks i have some of diabetes symptoms ( thirst and frequent urinating).Around that period i had a pretty big stress.I talked to my doctor : i made Blood Test, urine test, ultrasound of abdomen, a1c test.I bought Glucometer to check my glucose level even.a1c came up as 5.3I had high cholesterol, but doctor told that i need to exercise a little bit more and it will be ok ( it`s not too high) , but i didnt have any overweight problems definitely.My doctor told that 5.3 its a normal level and if i want i can retest it in 1-2 month period.Today its around 1 month after first symptoms.I am trying to monitor my glucose level probably because i am very anxious about it.I was on  a diet ( low carb diet) and i lost about 3 kg in a pretty short period of time 2-3 weeks +  i was exercising each day ( swimming).And when i tested my blood glucose it always was in normal range. ( around 80 fasting around 100 after a meal)Today i decided to make an experiment and to eatpack of California roll ( white rice some sauce and i think a crab meat) + i ate a red apple after this.I checked my BG level in 1 ( probably 45 minutes)  hour and it was around 140-150And in 2 hours it was around 110-115In around 3 hours my glucose was 74-78.Is such jump is normal?How i would know if there is a Type 1 Diabetes or Pre Diabetes or Type 2?Do i need to do any other testing which will help me to find the solution?I am male, 23 years old, 186 cm, 79kg.I don`t have overweight problems at all which are common to type 2.And as i understand the people with type 1 Diabetes always need insulin to stay healthy, and if they will dont use insulin their organism will not be able to use sugar. ( it will gather in their blood).But my fasting sugar is always around 80-85
title: Diabetes/Pre Diabetes concern.
